dict.string: Uses R: to ensure this matches after any other injections.
Yes this is a bit ridiculous, there are quite a lot of these

(?ix: (?=/?> # Tag without type attribute | type(?=[\s=]) (?!\s*=\s* ( '' # Empty | "" # Values | ('|"|) ( text/ # Text mime-types ( javascript(1\.[0-5])? | x-javascript | jscript | livescript | (x-)?ecmascript | babel # Javascript variant currently # recognized as such ) | application/ # Application mime-types ( (x-)?javascript | (x-)?ecmascript ) | module ) [\s"'>] ) ) ) )
